::Striker::

Striker frowns at Spears' display of panic.

"We can't leave the pod," he says calmly, walking over to her and putting out 
a hand to help her up, "We're in the middle of a very big ocean. Leaving the 
pod would be suicide, especially with that storm out there."

Another shake of the pod emphasizes his words as Striker barely keeps his 
balance.
